Huang Tiejun: Incubating AI companies is a by-product. The Beijing Academy of Artificial Intelligence aims to become internationally top-notch.

When Huang Tiejun was interviewed by the AI Research Institute of the Beijing News, he said that science is different from technology. The former requires the inspiration of genius to achieve original innovation, while the latter requires more support from material conditions and repeated trial and error.
